text: Kaya tumacya palanakartyacya daya-krpeci he vibhagani karatata? Amhica tyancya aihika jivanaci (ajivika) tyancyata vatuna dili ahe ani ekala dusaryahuna adhika cangale kele ahe yasathi ki ekamekanna adhina karuna ghyave ani jyala he loka jama karita phirata aheta, tyahuna tumacya palanakartyaci daya - krpa atisaya uttama ahe
